title: CoinMorketCap
author: CoinMorketCap
content: Don't miss the 100% bonus on this first presale round!CoinMarketCoin Presale Is Now LIVEYou can now buy $CMCC token on our official presale website :www.coin-market-cap.netHurry - the first come first served presale will be closed once the hardcap is filled!$ETH $BTC $BNB $SOL $LUNA $ADA $AVAX $DOGE $SHIB $APE

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: ScamThe site is very similar to https://coinmarketcap.com but it is just a scam site, people should avoid that above scam site.Code:Domain:coin-market-cap.netRegistrar:NameCheap, Inc.Registered On:2022-04-29Expires On:2023-04-29Updated On:2022-04-29The site was created just few weeks ago and just want to scam. Avoid

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: For some reason I'm not surprised. Almost any sale of tokens not with the help of the launchpad, or similar site, but directly from the site - this is a potential scam. In addition, suspicion is aroused by the attempt to tie to a well-known project, although it should be logical that this would be written on CoinMarketCap itself, rather than creating a separate site.
